name: PreToken
Pre Prediction

func:
msg.payload=msg.payload.predictions[0].values[0][0]      
return msg;

global.set('temperature',msg.payload.d.temperature)
global.set('humidity',msg.payload.d.humidity)
global.set('objectTemp',msg.payload.d.objectTemp)
return msg;

name: temperature
func:
var temp = global.get('temperature')
return {payload:msg.payload.d.temperature}

name: humidity
func:
var hum = global.get('humidity')
return {payload:msg.payload.d.humidity}

name: object.Temp
func:
var objtemp = global.get('objectTemp')
return {payload:msg.payload.d.objectTemp}
